TopicTitle: Satoru Iwata, president of Nintendo, has passed away

Articles.Content: [In a brief press release](http://www.nintendo.co.jp/ir/pdf/2015/150713e.pdf), Nintendo has revealed that the president of the company, Satoru Iwata, passed away yesterday due to complications involving a growth in his bile duct. He will be missed.
That sucks. RIP in pepperoni Satoru Iwata.
I'm so sorry to hear this. Next to the PC, Nintendo makes my favorite gaming systems.

Wow, that's saddening ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif). My condolences to his family and friends.
